content.text:
# List of Albanian European Film Award winners and nominees

This is a list of Albanian European Film Award winners and nominees. This list details the performances of Albanian actors, actresses, and films that have either been submitted or nominated for, or have won, a European Film Award.
Awards and nominations
{| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" width="100%"
|-
!width="5%"|Year
!width="18%"|Award
!width="28%"|Recipient
!width="10%"|Result
!width="38%"|Note
!
|-
| align="center"| 1995
| European Film Academy Critics Award
| ''Ulysses' Gaze
|
| Greek-German-French-British-Bosnian-Albanian-Yugoslav-Italian-Romanian co-production
| align="center"|
|-
| align="center"| 2008
| Best Actress
| Arta Dobroshifor Lorna's Silence
|
| Kosovan-Albanian actress
| align="center"|
|-
| align="center"| 2016
| Best Short Film
| Home''
|
| Kosovan-British-Albanian co-production
| align="center"|
|}
*Nominations – 3
*Wins – 1
